attributes.action: A Weeks Extra Annual Leave for All Key Workers.
attributes.additional_details: As a way of thanking these heroic actions and people, this petition would like to ask that when this outbreak is over, they are rewarded with an extra week of annual leave.
attributes.background: Key workers have had to put their health and welfare on the line, working exceptionally hard, to help to stem the Covid 19 outbreak, whilst all other workers have been self-isolating and effectively having a holiday from the work environment.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
